-e ---

Zank seems to be a preserved root:

Zank 𓈙𓈖𓍿𓏏 ⋍ Zankᵗ 𓍲𓈖𓍿𓏏 ⋍ Händel 𓇉𓄿𓂝𓇋𓋳 strife ⇔ war ?

𓊃 𓎡 𓇱 | embroil (in quarrels) | zick zynk Zank !

𒋾 ZAN < TIN *tanþs, from Proto-Indo-European *h₃dónts.
𒋾 TIN = ZAN arrow = ZANK / SANKH 𓋹

1712 仗 zhang4 ZANK battle zhàng:仗:⿰亻丈 rén zhàng
344 争 zheng1 ZANK 争 struggle/fight zhēng:争:⿱⺈⿻⺕亅 dāo jì,kè,kí,계 jué ZANK 争 Zheng1 仗 zhang4 讼 song4 战 zhan4
145 战 zhan4 ZANK 争讼怂 < 山上 shang to fight/fight/war/battle zhàn:战:⿰占戈 zhān gē
1862 讼 song4 Zank litigation(Streitsache) sòng:讼:⿰讠公 yán gōng
3702 怂 song3 怂 < 山上 shang > 讼争 zank arouse sǒng:怂:⿱从心 cōng xīn
1412 抢 qiang1/qiang3 ZANK 争仗战 a’gainst fight over/against wind/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch qiāng:抢:⿰扌仓 shǒu cāng
624 状 zhuang4 Strong 长 cháng 2. zank? strong/great/accusation/suit/state/condition zhuàng:状:⿰丬犬 qiáng quǎn
